# Long Reads Only Assembly

This directory contains Unicycler genome assembly output.

## Expected Output Files

- `assembly.fasta` - Final assembled genome sequences
- `assembly.gfa` - Assembly graph in GFA format
- `unicycler.log` - Assembly log file

## Generated By

```bash
conda activate 04_unicycler
unicycler -l processed_reads.fastq.gz \
    -o 05_genome_assembly/long_reads_only_assembly/ \
    -t 12 --verbosity 2
```
